metadata.title: CVE-2022-34346 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Out-of-bounds read in the Intel(R) Media SDK software before version 22.2.2may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation ofprivilege via local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-34346` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmfx-tools - 22.3.0-1
libmfx1 - 22.3.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: intel-mediasdk package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '22.3.0-1').
